original_text: The Lord says, ‘Listen to me, Babylon! I am your enemy! You are like a strong mountain that destroys the whole earth. I will punish you with all my strength. I will push you down from your high place. I will make you a heap of ashes. The Lord says, ‘Listen to me, Babylon! I am your enemy! You are like a strong mountain that destroys the whole earth. I will punish you with all my strength. I will push you down from your high place. I will make you a heap of ashes. The Lord says,
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 온 세계를 멸하는 멸망의 산아 보라 나는 네 원수라 나의 손을 네 위에 펴서 너를 바위에서 굴리고 너로 불 탄 산이 되게 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: You are like a strong mountain
I will punish you with all my strength
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 모든 힘으로 너를 벌할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will push you down from your high place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 높은 곳에서 밀어 내릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will make you a heap of ashes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 재 더미로 만들 것이다
